name: Daily-Remind-SMS-Countdown
description: With This Program You Can Set A Daily Reminder With SMS

SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID You Can Get This Free Visit www.twilio.com

TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Account Authtoken You Can Get This Free Visit www.twilio.com

NUM.description: The Recipient Phone Number To Send SMS Reminder. Format +947xxxxxxxx You Have To Verify This Number In Twilio

FROM.description: The Twilio Phone Number You Can Copy This From Your Twilio Console Page

DAY.description: The Day For Countdown. Format XXXX-XX-XX

TIME.description: Time To Send The SMS Daily In UTC Time

GREETS.description: Greeting Words,This Goes Before The Message. Format Greet1,Greet2

MESSAGE.description: The Message. This Goes Between The Greet & Remaing Days
